definitions.definition: A long unpadded strap to pass over and keep in place a blanket, pack or saddle on an animal.
A piece of tack wrapped around the belly of a horse, to use when longeing .
A girdle to fasten a garment, especially a cassock .

main_definition: A long unpadded strap to pass over and keep in place a blanket, pack or saddle on an animal.
secondary_definitions: A piece of tack wrapped around the belly of a horse, to use when longeing .
A girdle to fasten a garment, especially a cassock .
